songs.title: Bloody Mary - Dancin In Circle - Paparazzi - Angel Down - Joanne (ACT V)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Honey.. *evil laugh*
Oh..

[Verse 1]
Lcve is just a history that they may prove
And when you're gone
I'll tell them my rcligion's you
When Pontius comes to kill the king upon his throne
I'm ready for their stones

[Pre-Chorus]
I'll dance, dance, dance
With my hands, hands, hands
Above my head, head, head, like Jesus said
I'm gonna dance, dance, dance
With my hands, hands, hands above my head
Hands together, forgive him before he's dead, because...

[Chorus]
I won't cry for you. *dances*
I won't crucify the things you do
I won't cry for you
See, when you're gone, I'll still be Bloody Mare

[Post-Chorus]
Lcve..
Do you smell that ?
It's poison
:m YAAAAAH !

[Verse 2]
We are not just art for Michelangclo to carve
He can't rewrite the agro of my furied heart
I'll wait on mountain tops in Paris, cold
J'veux pas mourir tout seule

[Pre-Chorus]
I'll dance, dance, dance
With my hands, hands, hands
Above my head, head, head, like Jesus said
I'm gonna dance, dance, dance
With my hands, hands, hands above my head
Hands together, forgive him before he's dead, because...

[Chorus]
I won't cry for you. *dances*
I won't crucify the things you do
I won't cry for you
See, when you're gone, I'll still be Bloody Mare

[Post-Chorus]

Sorry Joanne, Gaga come's out to play

Im so sorry Joanne, this bitch showed up to play

Sorry Joanne, some other girl showed up...  b*
:m YAAAAAAAH !

Gaga !

[Interlude]
*get on kneels*

[Breakdown]
Dum dum, da-di-da
Dum dum, da-di-da-dadda-da-di-da
Dum dum, da-di-da
Dum dum, da-di-da
Dum dum, da-di-da-dadda-da-di-da
Dum dum, da-di-da

[Chorus]
I won't cry for you
I won't crucify the things you do, do, do
I won't cry for you
See (see), when you're gone, I'll still be Bloody, MAREE !

[Outro]
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Liberaté mi amor

-Dancin' in circle-

It’s f* hot in Roblox
Look at that costume *points little monster* you are delicious darling
Thank you so much to my beautiful, loyal, amazing fans, you are so filled with talent and joy. I’m so glad all the time…
That’s a very little monster in there *points fan* Hello! I can see you ;)

You know, did anybody get to go to the artr*ve? That was a party
Oh you know, that was my last tour, the artr*ave
And, when I went on tour, I went to my home, which is the first first home I’ve ever had, huh

And I walked around and I said, what am I gonna do now, in this house? Am I gonna write more music?
And I’m gonna go on tour again, ‘cause that’s really what I want to do
And I thought what am I gonna write about? I want so badly to relate to people that haven’t related to me yet, not because I’m
You know, don’t love the fans I have but I think it’s important you know to grab somebody else’s f* hat and try to walk in their sh* for a little while
So I made sure this album, Joanne, that I didn’t just honor the more personal sentiments
I made sure also to honor the h** in my heart
The trap of my spirit
You know one day, I’m gonna have a kid in one arm and a glass of Pxnot Grigio in the other

And as long as I keep dancin’ in circles it’ll feel real good to be lonely. LET’S GO!


[Intro]
Tap down those boots while I. *spin around the circle*
Hands up, lets go ! *waves*
Tap down those boots while I beat around
Funk me downtown

[Verse 1]
I lay around, touch myself to pass the time. *tcuch myself*
I feel down, I wish you were mine
I close my eyes. *spin*
Take a breath and I picture us in a place
I can't recognize, cmon !

[Pre-Chorus]
In the fire I call your name out
*dances*
Up all night tryin' to rub the pain out


[Chorus]
I'm singin': Bcby don't cry, bcby don't cry
Baby don't cry
Baby don't cry
Dancin' in circles, feels good to be lonely
Bcby don't cry, bcby don't cry *remove the clip*
I'm singin': Dancin' in circles, feels good to be lone-ly. *spin*


[Post-Chorus]
*spin*
*dances*
Funk me downtown

[Verse 2]
I fool myself. Hands up !
Swirl around as if I'm someone else
Your hands are mine
I do a trick, pretend that I am you until it clicks
I come alive, come alive


[Pre-Chorus]
In the fire I call your name out
Up all night tryin' to rub the pain out

[Chorus]
I'm singin': Bcby don't cry, bcby don't cry
*point mic*
Bcby don't cry, bcby don't cry
I'm singin': Dancin' in circles, feels good to be, cmon! -ly. *spin around the circle*

[Post-Chorus]
Tap down those boots while I beat around
Let's funk downtown!
Tap down those boots while I beat around
Funk me downtown!

[Bridge]
Hurts inside, but not this time. *poses*
All the things that are on my mind
Vanish as I tcuch myself. *waves*
Call out loud for you
Oh, can you hear me singin'?

[Chorus]
Baby don't cry
Baby don't cry
Baby don't cry
Baby don't cry
DANCIN' IN CIRCLES, FEELS GOOD TO BE LONELY !

[Post-Chorus]
*spin around the circle*
Tap down those boots while I beat around
Let's funk downtown!
Tap down those boots while I beat around
Funk me downtown..!
*dances*

-Paparazzi-

Excuse me Sir, hi. Hi. Hi Sir huh. *point, get on kneels*
You probably don’t know who I am, but I have like a ton of Instagram followers, if you could just, could you take my picture, I wanna be a star! *poses*

Hi man, hi. Hi. *looks*
You probably don’t know who I am but I have a tona followers on Snapchat, I’m like an influencer or whatever *looks up*, could you just do me a favour and take my picture? *poses*

I’m super f* talented
Whoever told you that they can make a living with the filter, they lied to you
-
Excuse me umh. Umh
You probably don’t know who I am, most people don’t know who i am but, I have you know a ton of followers in Instagram
And I’m a f. star using filters, if you can just shoot me for my life-style?

Hi. Hey sir. *point* How are you ?
You probably don’t know who I am but I’m born to be a star one day, and I heard I can be on magazine, I have social-medias. So if you can please take my close up
IM BORN TO BE A STAR ! *poses*
I need some fans

*sings* we are the crowd. We are c-coming out
Got my flash on it’s true. Need that picture of you, it’s so magical
We’d be so fantastic-oh

[Verse 1]
We are the crowd, we're c-coming out
Got my flash on, it's true, need that picture of you, it's so magical

We'd be so fantastical
Leather and jeans, garage glamorous
Not sure what it means, but this photo of us, it don't have a price
Ready for those flashing lights
Put your hands up for Roblox Stars!

[Chorus]
I'm your biggest fan *waves*
I'll follow you until you lcve me
Papa-paparazzi
Baby, there's no other superstar you know that I'll be
Your papa-paparazzi
Promise I'll be kind
But I won't stop until that boy is mine. *spin*
Baby, you'll be famous
Chase you down until you love me
Papa-paparazzi

*dances*
Oh ! NO ! LEAVE ME ! LET ME LONELY !

NO! STOP FOLLOWING ME!
OH! YOU WILL NEVER M.. AAAH!! *gets killed*

-Angel Down-

[Verse 1]
I confess I am lost
In the age of the social
On our knees, take a test
To be lovin' and grateful

[Pre-Chorus]
Shots were fired on the street
By the church where we used to meet
Angel down, angel down
But the people just stood around

[Chorus]
I'm a believer, it's a trial
Foolish and weaker, oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down
I'm a believer, it's chaos
Where are our leaders? Oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down

[Verse 2]
Doesn't everyone belong
In the arms of the sacred?
Why do we pretend we're wrong?
Has our young courage faded?

[Pre-Chorus]
Shots were fired on the street
By the church where we used to meet
Angel down, angel down
Why do people just stand around?

[Chorus]
I'm a believer, it's a trial
Foolish and weaker, oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down
I'm a believer, it's chaos
Where are our leaders? Oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down

[Bridge]
Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo
Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo
Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo
Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo

[Chorus]
I'm a believer, it's a trial
Foolish and weaker, oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down
I'm a believer, it's chaos
Where are our leaders? Oh, oh, oh
I'd rather save an angel down

[Outro]
Save that angel
Catch that angel
Save that angel
Catch that angel
Save that angel
Catch that angel
Save that angel
Catch that angel
Catch that angel

-Joanne-

*gets guitar*
*sits*

We’re very honored tonight that my latest album ‘Joanne’ is number 8 in United States. Thank you! :)

And I just want to take a, take a little poll here. Don’t worry about it, it’s not gonna offend me, I just wanna know, how many of you here tonight in the audience don’t know who Joanne is?
Oh. I think many people are a bit lost
But, if you do know who Joanne is, that’s amazing
And for those of you wondering tonight, you might be saying, who’s Joanne? *laughs*
And that person, Joanne, is two things. Number 1, my middle name is Joanne, given to me by my parents
But Joanne, was also the name of my father’s sister who I was named after. She died in 1974 of lupus
This loss of my family, it travelled decades and generations that I thought she would be like an angel, from the dinner table
I thought of her and my parents at night, and I study her, so that I might be able to understand my father
So when I asked of all of you tonight, it’s even the joyest moment that we get to spend all together, knowing I know
And many of you know that there are people all over the world they could never afford to go see a live show like this, you are all so very lucky
And as we got time to ask you, I would ask you to honor your own pain in this moment, and take yourself back to that place where you were blasted and your life was changed so much
So much that you don’t even remember who you were before

For me, that pain has only one name, and it’s Joanne

*whispers* one, two, three
*plays guitar*

Take my hand, stay Joanne
Heaven’s not ready for you…

Girl, where do you think you’re going, where do you think you’re going, going girl?
Girl, where do you think you’re going! Girl


We both know, things don’t work that way
I promised I, wouldn’t say goodbye, so I grin, and my voice gets thin

Girl, where do you think you’re going?

Honestly I know where you’re going

And I’ll still love you even if I can’t see you anymore. Can’t wait to see you soar

Joanne middle stop speech:
Hello gentlemen
I guess what I’m trying to say is I was trying to figure out myself a little better, and, instead of just staring at myself
I tried to figure out my dad, and my mom, and their pain. And it led me right back home

*sits*
*whispers* one, two, three

*plays guitar*

Girl, where do you think you’re going, where do you think you’re going, going girl!
Girl, where do you think you’re going, where do you think you’re going, going, gi-oh-rl!

Call me Joanne

Xo Joanne

XoXo all our pain, makes us this way, it made me who I am

Joanne
